Introduction
This topic contains instructions for handling notice of incarceration of a(n)
apportionee
, and
custodian who is
not an apportionee
, and
also an apportionee
.
title: M21-1, Part VI, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section C - Incarceration of Dependents and Certain Survivors
citation: Part VI, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section C
